about_the_game:
Welcome to Peanut Butter Jelly Wars, a thrilling real-time strategy (RTS)-lite game where players face off in an epic battle to determine which spread reigns supreme!

The gameplay is fast-paced and action-packed, with intuitive controls that are easy to learn but challenging to master. With 15 units to pick from, there are over 3,000 combinations to try! Lead your own unique army of powerful units, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.

The local multiplayer mode is where Peanut Butter Jelly Wars really shines. Screen cheating is encouraged to keep tabs on your opponent's schemes. Each player controls a Captain who spawns in their own army of insects, UFOs, and explosive garden gnomes. The fast-paced gameplay and unpredictable battles will keep you on the edge of your seat!

So what are you waiting for? Grab your spoon and get ready to lead your team to victory in Peanut Butter Jelly Wars!

name: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft 64 bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

short_description: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars is a thrilling real-time strategy (RTS)-lite game where players face off in an epic battle to determine which spread reigns supreme!
